text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Congrats on getting a trainer~! You did it! I'm really happy for you!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Thanks alot! Looks like I need to work harder from now on, huh?

text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Class Rep Top Road, you're always helping me with studying and training, so I'm hoping your races will be a big success~!

text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. Class Rep Top Road, I really love your running. Just watching makes me excited and raises my motivation…… that's why I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I'm glad! I'll run alot! Well……because it makes me happy too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: For the trainer that talked to me, I need to do my best for them too……!

text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ah, but they're a rookie right? Hmmmm……for Class Rep Top Road, I think it'd be better if a veteran trainer spoke to you.

text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Then, maybe you could have started racing right away, right? Maybe it would have been better to not respond so quickly, and hold out for a bit longer~.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Hold out……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (…………At that time, Trainer-san just stood there with their mouth open didn't they?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (I was really happy so I answered immediately but, maybe that's not how it usually goes……)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Does it normally just start with meeting each other? Getting to know one another, maybe I needed to take the time to think about that?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: But, I……don't regret it and I think I'm glad I accepted it……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: After all, Trainer-san, out of all the other Uma Musume around, they chose to speak to me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Opera O-chan, and Ayabe-san too. So many talented Uma Musume. But out of all of those, Trainer-san chose me)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (……They had expectations for me)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……Alright. These feelings, I need to properly convey them to Trainer-san! That I won't make them regret choosing me……!

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: I'd known she had enrolled in Tracen Academy but…… I never would have expected that you'd become her trainer.

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: Way back when I was a coach for a club for Uma Musume kids, Top Road was there. Even back then she stood out.

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: She was a hard-worker, and loved running from the bottom of her heart.

text_block_list.name: Young Top Road
text_block_list.text: Coach! Can I go run one more time!? Next time, I think I'll be able to run even faster!

text_block_list.name: Young Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……Huh, huh? It's not going well……but, but! One more time! If I do it one more time, then for sure!!

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: She's a little like you. She's so straight-forward that sometimes she's a little awkward. ……But, she doesn't give up. She doesn't have the option to give up.

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: It'll be fine. You'll do fine. I believe in you. Work hard like you have been up until now, and go get some real experience.
I was still an inexperienced youngester. I was aware of that. But, if he still had expectations for me then――
choice_data_list: I just need to study then……!

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: Right! For you two, G1's aren't just a dream! That awesome scene, I want both of you to show it to me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I missed the timing to enter……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (But……Trainer-san and Coach already know each other. What an amazing coincidence……)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (……So Trainer-san was also carrying heavy expectations. Even after becoming a pro, still studying hard……)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……that's the type of person who chose me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Then, those feelings……I definitely don't want to betray them.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (In the Mock Race that's in a week……there, I need to show them my run again. Not with words, but by running, so they can be reassured that they chose right.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: With that decided, on to training! I need to get my legs ready to take on any training menu that comes my way!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Allllright! So I can properly respond to everyone's, to Trainer-san's expectations……I'll do my best!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ――Ah.

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: It's fine to get yourself motivated, but is this really the place for that? As usual, this part of you is just a little uncool.
